title: Mr. Dalrymple Revealed
description: In this second volume of the adventures of The Counterfeit Cavalier, we discover the true nature of Mr. Dalrymple and Lady Katherine begins to scheme anew. The Counterfeit Cavalier is a sweet Regency romp in four parts. Volume Two is 7,718 words long, or about 21 pages.
author: Lydia M. Sheridan
